title: John Cleese & Big Furry Hat | Colbert Classic
description:
Comedy legend and Monty Python co-founder John Cleese stopped by to talk to Stephen about his book "So, Anyway," how he and his fellow Pythons pitched their show to the BBC, and why fish are funny. And Stephen's furry hat is back for some proclamations... and so is John Cleese's.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
